parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The main streaming domain to query.

*   You can query one or more domain names. If you specify multiple domain names, separate them with commas (,).
*   If you leave this parameter empty, the data of all domain names within your Alibaba Cloud account is returned.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the monitoring session. If you leave this parameter empty, data of all monitoring sessions is queried by default. Separate multiple session IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The time granularity. Valid values: **3600** and **86400**. 3600 specifies that data is queried by hour and 86400 specifies that data is queried by day.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region of the live center. If you leave this parameter empty, data of all regions is queried by default. Separate multiple regions with commas (,).

parameters.name: SplitBy
parameters.description: The key that is used to group data. Valid values: **domain**, **region**, **instance**, and **resolution**. Default value: **resolution**. resolution specifies that data is grouped by resolution. Separate multiple values with commas (,).

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format.

*   The time must be in UTC.
*   The minimum data granularity is 1 hour.
*   If you leave this parameter empty, data in the previous 24 hours is queried.
